website_summaries.verdict: Works well to help cats maintain a steady kidney function, while also helping with maintaining hydration.
pros: Uses a liquid formulation and a bacon flavoring, so you can add it to the cat's food easily
Helps strengthen the kidney's ability to filter the blood properly
Primarily consists of natural and organic ingredients
cons: Very small bottle, so the price per ounce of supplement is expensive, but you only use a little bit daily

customer_reviews.title: losing weight and just looked terrible. I started giving her this and after 3-4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I really thought I was putting my 15 year old cat down due to kidney issues. She wasn't eating, losing weight and just looked terrible. I started giving her this and after 3-4 days she was starting to eat again and gain weight. I was pleasantly surprised. I don't expec her to live foreve but, if this keeps her comfortable until then I will be extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Misang52

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my pet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to work for my old cat, but it was counterproductive in that it irritated his bladder, even causing him to urinate blood and hang out in the cat box. As it is an expensive tincture,and I didn't want to think it was causing the problem, I stopped administering it until his irritation cleared, and tried again with a lower dose. No blood, but same cat box loitering. I researched the ingredients online, some of them list bladder irritation as a possible side effect.
customer_reviews.author: Aldne Now

customer_reviews.title: ONLY FOUR DAYS and already seeing IMPROVEMENT!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's cat she's had since she was 6 was looking bad. We know she has feline renal disease. She was lethargic, losing weight, not keeping her coat looking nice and barfing every day. FOUR DAYS of taking these drops and she has energy again, is playing with her toys, eating all of her food, grooming herself again and has only barfed once in four days. I'm only giving four stars simply because it's only been four days and I don't want wishful thinking to be clouding my judgment but I really think this stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: IndianaJules

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stuff!  Positive Bloodwork Results!  Happy Kitty & Happy Servant!
customer_reviews.text: After being diagnosed with early stage kidney failure, I started my cat on this (along with switching to a higher protein diet -Merrick Purrfect Bistro w/o seafood- and 1/4 pill of Pepcid A/C once a day). It's made a difference - and I have the bloodwork results to prove it! So pleased with this product, and I would highly recommend it! The results of his initial diagnosis and his followup after starting on the Kidney Support Gold (his BUN is actually down in the normal range again).
customer_reviews.author: D. Downin

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works. My cat was diagnosed with ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. My cat was diagnosed with kidney failure and the veterinarian prescribed a particular kind of medicine. Instead of buying medicine from the Vet, I decided to do some research on Amazon and found the Kidney Support Gold. I am on my second bottle and don't want to run out. I mix it with my cat's food, and she appears healthy, and is eating, drinking, and regaining her weight. Thank you Amazon, and thanks to the makers of Kidney Support Gold.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi P.

customer_reviews.title: We tried Kidney Support when our bengal cat diagnosed with ...
customer_reviews.text: We tried Kidney Support when our bengal cat diagnosed with early stage kidney disease. He has been taking this since once a day in his food and the last time he had a check up, his kidneys came back completely normal! Will continue to buy the product! I so believe that it has saved our cats' life!
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: It really worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: My cat became very sick and was diagnosed with kidney disease in December 2016. She began taking this in the beginning of Jan. I saw an immediate improvement within 3 days. Her appetite came back and she was much more playful. She recently passed away but I am positive that this gave her another 6 1/2 more months of a happy life. This medicine gave us enough time to say goodbye. I usually don't write reviews but I want other cat owners to have a chance to add a bit more quality time with their fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Brought my cat back from the dead
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! My cat was dying from kidney failure and we were trying everything we could to save her. We ordered this product but before it got here she took a turn for the worse. She was hardly moving, not eating and not very interested in hanging out with us. The life behind her eyes had gone. We made an appointment with the vet to put her down and the day of the appointment she did a huge 180. Super hungry and playful. We started her on the drops and she has just improved everyday. We know she is old (17 years) and we are on borrowed time but these drops really help her!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It's Helping!
customer_reviews.text: One of our newest sanctuary cat is 8 years old and was diagnosed as having early kidney disease, which I attributed to his former owner feeding him really cheap, crappy kibble. We almost never see kidney disease in our cats and usually not until they are 17+ years old. He was losing weight rapidly and not eating much. I tried this and I must say I am impressed. His appetite increased, his energy levels are good and he is slowly regaining weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if it works but my cat died 7 days after starting this product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this stuff is effective or not I do know that I started giving it to my cat on 3 Oct and she died on 10 Oct. I don't know if her death is related to this product but I can say that she did not like this. I first started by putting 2 drops on top of her food and she would eat around those parts. I then had to mix it into the food but even then she was hesitant to eat it. I'm not sure what I expected from this product, maybe a miracle, but it didn't help her gain any weight. In fact she almost stopped eating because out this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Dont give to your pet if she is too thin or not eating.
customer_reviews.text: Might help if you notice something in your animal early on. My cat might of been to far gone. She looked good, drank, moved around. But wouldn't eat. Thought this would help but it could of caused her to bleed internally. She started bleeding from the mouth 3 hours after taking this. Could of happened regardless. There is more to the story but I'll save the book. Use with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Saved my little girls life
customer_reviews.text: This has literally saved my little girls life. Simone was dying on my front yard because a veterinarian had "fixed" her, clipped her ear and put her out to die. That is a practice now happening across this country. When I took her to the vet he said her kidneys were no doubt stressed because of the condition she was in. So when I brought her home I immediately looked up a natural substance that could help her stressed kidneys. If I don't use this she is straining in the box. So it is very important that she gets her drops twice a day. She plays, has gained weight and is becoming very social. Thanks Pet Wellbeing!
customer_reviews.author: crasa

customer_reviews.title: Hoping my kitty lives to 20 something!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 16 yr old cat was not doing well last year with her kidney disease. I started giving her this in her food now for about 7 months and just purchased more because she is doing better! Her appetite is really good and she is keeping her food down and her overall cat-anality ( not personality although she might as well be a person to me!) has become much more content. I gave this a couple of months to try before giving up. I think she may not have liked the flavor. Now she doesn't notice . I'm very pleased and highly recommend this !
customer_reviews.author: GoodBetterBest

customer_reviews.title: WORST PRODUCT EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat had a horrible reaction to this product! She was in terrible pain and urinating blood for weeks. After half a dozen vet visits and over $1,000 in bills, we took her off of this product and her symptoms disappeared immediately and permanently. Dangerous product. Get a reputable product from your vet!
customer_reviews.author: Beegonia

customer_reviews.title: A blessing! I wish more people knew about this!
customer_reviews.text: This medicine was instrumental in saving my cat's life. Her kidneys were in failure from old age. My vet insisted on putting her down. Instead, I talked to a holistic vet, who pointed me to this remedy and to something that would improve kitty's appetite. Those two things have strengthened her so much that she's acting perfectly normal again, without all those multiple runs to the box or the need for subcutaneous fluids. Senior kidney failure is an inevitability once it begins, but the vet says we've given her another 6 to 8 months at least.
customer_reviews.author: PAM

customer_reviews.title: Day 3 he started eating again
customer_reviews.text: Started this product after my vet okayed it. My vet diagnosed my 10 year old Charlie with kidney disease. Recommended putting him to sleep because he would soon stop eating and drinking and go into shock. Three days ago he stopped eating, would only eat cooked or raw chicken and then would throw it up. I started the supplement and had little hope. Three days in hes drinking and eating science diet dry food for kidney disease. I'm so happy, he's even acting like his old self again! Thank you! thank you! thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie

customer_reviews.title: Does it work? Well, my cat is still alive.
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying my second bottle today. The first bottle has lasted seven months and isn't even empty, but it's getting low. No idea whether this stuff really works or it's literally snake oil, but here's what I know: The cat is still alive and healthy, despite what the vet describes as "kidney failure." She's finicky about her food but she doesn't mind having this stuff dripped into her breakfast every day. Is it keeping my cat alive longer? Who knows. But it ain't expensive, so why not buy it and use it?
customer_reviews.author: Doug in Madison

customer_reviews.title: Cats died
customer_reviews.text: Cats wouldn't take it; 3 died due to kidney failure after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Glad I discovered it
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is still hanging in months after the vet gave him weeks to live due to worsening renal function. He’s a picky eater but laps this right up. Glad I discovered it.
customer_reviews.author: FAR

customer_reviews.title: and he was doing okay he perked up at times but this sadly did not help at all like others say in their reviews he simply vomitted it ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat was diagnosed with Renal Failure - kidney failure, and he was doing okay he perked up at times but this sadly did not help at all like others say in their reviews he simply vomitted it up the tikes given to him after the first time we gave it to him when we recieved the products. He died sadly and im sorru to say but this did not help.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: It helped my dying cat !
customer_reviews.text: I just want to thank Per Wellbring for saving my cat. I started this medication 4 days ago when my cat wouldn’t even eat, sit up, slow breathing etc. I seriously thought that my cat was going to die any day. He lost so much weight but since I gave him this he has started to walk around and eat and not looking dead anymore ! He is still in the middle of recuperating strength but is better than see him not improving and get worse so if your cat it’s having kidney problems this should help. It took him 4 days for him to starting to look alive
customer_reviews.author: Don Jon

customer_reviews.title: Wow, back to her younger self again?? ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, back to her younger self again??? who knew? it has been a month of giving her this, though she responded immediately, she continues to do well/better. thank you!!! she is a rescue AND very old we were sure it was about that time. Never been so thrilled to be so totally incorrect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JennS

customer_reviews.title: Miracle meds for cats exhibiting signs of renal failure!
customer_reviews.text: Pet Wellbeing Kidney Support Gold for Cats saved our cats life! She was diagnosed with the beginning of renal failure about 2 years ago, and now her counts are in the normal range. She is a small cat, and a bottle lasts a long time. She is never happy with taking meds, as none of us want to do, but sometimes need to. I found this from a video about a cat that the owner was one day from having her cat put down, and her cat started eating again, and functioning more normally. I don't know how long her cat was on this medicine, but it worked for her, and for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ross DeSautel

customer_reviews.title: Miracle supplement
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat has kidney failure. She stopped eating and drinking on her own. The doctor told me to consider euthanasia. After seeing all the great reviews, I started to give her this supplement right away. My cat started to eat on her own after two months on this supplement, then three weeks later she started to drink water on her own too. Her lab works came back normal. My vet thought it's a miracle. Thank you pet wellbeing for creating such a great supplement. Never give up hope.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peng

customer_reviews.title: Put new life in my sweet old kitty
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the claims but in light of the many reviews I felt compelled to try these drops for my old Kitty who recently got very sick and was diagnosed with kidney disease. He has experienced steady improvement since a couple of weeks after starting the drops. He eats and drinks well, his urination habits have normalized, and he even kills his toy mouse on a regular basis. He often has an early morning race around the upstairs and has started grooming again. We are so grateful to see our baby feeling well again.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: wonderful. Had her bloodwork done and 12 of the ...
customer_reviews.text: wonderful. Had her bloodwork done and 12 of the 16 categories were improved. The vet said to cut her thyroid medicine in half. Vet was surprised it had worked. I had spoken with her before I ordered it and she had checked it out but couldn't find much info between her peers. Said I don't need to bring her back for 6 months. I am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Elgie-Sietsema

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this. Might cause permanent da to age to pet!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I used it 3 times and 1/2 the amount they said and my cat was having head twitches. That's not the worst part of it on the 4th day she had a seizure! By the grace of God she was OK and I saw the seizure and helped her through it and so far no permanent damage but I would never use this. It was such a trama for my old cat whose 19. All the reviews were so high I thought I would take a chance no way never again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle in a bottle! My 17yr old kitty was suffering from renal failure for quite some time, really didn't think she was gonna make it at all! Just a few day's after giving her 4 drops twice a day she is actually acting like her normal self! She had been hiding and crying for several months, she is now back hanging out with us,eating dry food again(was only eating wet food) I just cannot say enough good things about this product! Thank you so very much!!! As this kitty has been and is a major part of our family for the past 17yrs!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Carr

customer_reviews.title: Seems to really work
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers I have an old (16 years) cat who was diagnosed last year with CKD. He’d started going downhill, not eating and very lethargic, not himself at all. A $700+ visit to the vet and sub q fluids, appetite stimulants, antinausea meds, etc. got him feeling better, but shortly thereafter he started to feel poorly again. We started this supplement and after about a month he is clearly feeling better. Eating well, jumping up in my lap, acting more himself. Hoping it helps him have good quality of life in the time he has left with us. We do the drops in his wet food and mix it in; he eats it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Carman

customer_reviews.title: 3 week review - great results for cat with renal failure
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 year old cat was diagnosed with renal failure in August 2019. He was doing okay eating Hi Tor Neo ( he would not eat prescription food ) with a potassium supplement from the vet and Aminavast I bought online. In June he was barely eating and was lethargic. I decided to give this product a try. The first few doses I put directly in his mouth. He started eating again and now I put it in his food. He is eating regularly and has energy again. He lets us know when he wants food several times a day. This product has made a tremendous difference !
customer_reviews.author: Lori Turner

customer_reviews.title: Kidney Support Gold worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical about the product because vet said our cat (16 years old ) has kidney failure and soon should be euthanize. It stopped eating for about two weeks, lost a lot of weight, just drinking water and vomiting. But after we gave him Kidney Support Gold two times a day for several days, we did not believe our eyes, he start eating a little bit and then more and more. So he is coming to normal, gain a little weight, we are hopefully for the best. We thank you for the good product that actually work, thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: SIINIR

customer_reviews.title: My Cat is a Drama Queen
customer_reviews.text: I think this works, because my cat would head for food and water directly after I would give her the drops. However, she's too big of a drama queen to keep trying -- she almost hurt herself trying to get out of my arms the last time. It has a pleasant maple scent, so I don't know why she hates it. She can't stand wet food, so that's not an option, and I can't put the drops in her water bowl because we have two other cats and one of them definitely doesn't need his appetite stimulated! I did give the bottle to a friend whose only cat also has kidney disease; hopefully they'll work for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shari L.

customer_reviews.title: Our cat had kidney disease. We used the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat had kidney disease .We used the product and our cat improved . He didn't get back to normal but he improved . I don't know if this was because of the product but about a week after we began using it our cat went into the basement and wouldn't come back . I tried bringing him upstairs many times and he would immediately go back to the basement . He seemed to be afraid . His recovery only lasted about a month when he took a nose dive and within a week we had to have him euthanized . For me the month was worth the price .
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Pinkley

customer_reviews.title: CRF kitty (17) is doing great
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a CRF kitty needs to be giving this to your cat. My CalGal is doing very well since beginning to administer this to her. I mix it with a very small amount of cream in a syringe. I also give her the "Old Friend" from Pet Wellbeing. This combination (with changing her to a low phosphorus food) has her kidney levels coming down and she is acting like she feels much better.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Stabilized my cats kidney disease
customer_reviews.text: Smells delicious, like bacon. It's hard to treat kidney disease with anything but prescription food and sub-cutaneous fluids. My cat will happily hunger strike any food she doesn't like. After a few months of using this, took her for blood work and the vet expected her kidney values to have plummeted because we increased her hyperthyroid meds. Surprise! Kidneys were stable! The vet was shocked. I credit this stuff! A few months later, started seeing a holistic vet for herbal treatment supplementation, and the herb she recommended for healing kidney disease- Rehmannia- is the first ingredient in these drops! This stuff is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: KMS122

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of kitties over the years that have had kidney disease and I always give them this product. I feel it has improved their quality life and has helped them to live longer. I usually order my products directly from Petwellbeing, but this time I needed it fast before leaving for vacation, so I ordered through Amazon. Not only did I get my order in 2 days (I've got Prime), but the product was in the "old" glass bottle, which I prefer over the "new" plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Made My Cat Very Sick
customer_reviews.text: My cat, stage 2 kidney disease (CKD), went to sleep and would not eat for a whole day immediately after giving this pet wellbeing, kidney support gold product. I looked up reviews by Vets and they do not recommend. I should have asked my Vet fiest - it almost killed my poor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: She used to throw up immediately after eating and was shedding like crazy. Now she only throws up if it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this stuff for about 8 months ever since I found out my 17yr old cat has early stages of kidney disease. I noticed she doesn't throw up NEARLY as much as before. She used to throw up immediately after eating and was shedding like crazy. Now she only throws up if it's hairball related and the shedding is very minimal. Her coat is also looking a lot healthier/shinier and she seems to have more energy. I am convinced this stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: Teanna

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Another cat is taking the remedy for urinary ...
customer_reviews.text: I have three different remedys for three ailments - kidney treatment for an old 16 year old male and he is also getting the remedy to control sugar. So far so good. Another cat is taking the remedy for urinary problems but has not taken it long enough yet - only a week - to see if it has helped. I prefer natural remedies and I am hoping for great results.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with only one functioning kidney. My vet discovered this 6 years ago when this young cat was suddenly going into kidney failure. I decided to try Kidney Support Gold. It has kept my cat’s kidney numbers in the normal range all this time. This kitty will never live to be old, and her kidney levels are slowly starting to rise now, indicating kidney failure, but this product has given my cat years of a high-quality, normal life she might never have had.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It did not work for our cat. Maybe she ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for our cat. Maybe she was too far gone. I assume it might be more effective if started as soon as your pet shows any indication of kidney trouble. I would try it again (hopefully, won't need to!), as it offers hope where there often isn't much when it comes to kidney failure. Sometimes, traditional medicine does not provide many treatment options but alternative medicine and products such as this are worth trying and can help. The vets we dealt with were not opposed to using this, and felt there was no harm in giving it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Gary C

customer_reviews.title: My heart
customer_reviews.text: My little boy is 17 years old and he is in early stages of kidney disease. My vet said he has to start eating cat food for kidney support. Well me will not touch it. I tried all the different flavors but no go. Then I started looking on Amazon and that's when I found the pet Wellbeing for kidney support. I haven't taken him back to the vet yet to have blood work done to see how his kidneys are doing but I know he is doing better she has more energy his fur looks a lot better and he's finally starting to gain some of his weight back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Louella Sommers

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Appears to help.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 19+ yo female Russian Blue. Her last bloodtest reflected some early kidney issues. Marginally high on some categories. She has been losing weight for the last few years. The vet said she needs to eat more and drink more water. After these drops as directed on the bottle her appetite has improved and she's drinking more water. She seems to be sleeping more too.
customer_reviews.author: Transient Noise

customer_reviews.title: Helped our Sebastian
customer_reviews.text: Our fur baby, Sebastian, has an enlarged heart and takes Vetmedin, Furosemide, and Enalapril 2x a day for the past 3 years and it was affecting his liver and kidneys. Early last year we started using this and his levels are back to normal (albeit on the high side). His tests really surprised our vet and said to keep on adding it to his daily meds. Thank you Pet Wellbeing for helping our fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: Ran-D

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came in a different flavor for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give more stars, but between my two cats, I'm only successful in giving this to one of them. I'm not sure why they market this product for cats when not all cats actually like bacon flavor. Of my two cats, the boy will eat anything, but my girl is the picky one. I try to hide this with their favorite dry food treats, but I'm not always successful. She is NOT a fan of this artificial bacon flavor and I really want her to benefit from a kidney support supplement. Suggestion to the Manufacturer : Is it possible to make this product in other flavors? Chicken is pretty universal between both cats and dogs.
customer_reviews.author: musiclvr2675

customer_reviews.title: I read another lady’s review on the actual well-being website ...
customer_reviews.text: I read another lady’s review on the actual well-being website before I purchased it. I have two older cats 16 years old, and typically they start developing kidney issues and get renal failure at that age. This is not a silver bullet or a magic cure by any means, but this stuff really does work. It seems to give them more of an appetite, and they seem to have a little bit more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: It is helping to keep my 15 year old cat's kidneys healthy
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor first introduced me to this product. I had a senior cats with kidney challenges. I started using this product for him. While I am not certain if it actually improved his condition, it certainly did not worsen his condition. I gave the product to my other cat for about one year. I am now giving it to my cat who will be 16 years old on May 3, 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kay

customer_reviews.title: Does this work for Kidney Disease?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since last July when my 21 yr old cat began to show signs of kidney disease - hypertension, resulting in hemmoraghing in eye, excessive thirst. weight loss. Vet recommended BP meds which over time resolved hypertension and eye issues. He had no knowledge of kidney drops but after reading product sheet said it couldn't hurt. Blood panel this Dec. he was pleased with results - I think the drops are helping slow progression of the disease and also stimulate appetite. I add drops twice daily to Delectables Tuna Bisque which he readily laps up. I would recommend this product for any cat with kidney disease.
customer_reviews.author: mary bacsar

customer_reviews.title: Bottles are no longer glass.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed because I have used PetWellbing supplements for several years for my cat and have had excellent results. However, this past month when I reordered their Kidney Support it had leaked and oil was all over the bottle and package it came in. One of the reasons I liked PetWellbing, besides the quality of their products, was because they were in glass bottles. With all the info out now about how much plastic we are ingesting I don't understand why they would downsize too using plastic bottles. Sadly, I will no longer be ordering from them.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: I gave the recommended amount to my cat for two days but then ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave the recommended amount to my cat for two days but then he had a stroke so I won't be giving him any more. I can't say this caused his stroke but he is just starting with kidney issues, he isn't in kidney failure yet but now he is definitely worse off.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Consult your Vet first
customer_reviews.text: While I cannot with any certainty claim a direct relationship - we gave this to our 16 year old Burmese who was diagnosed with kidney failure - within one day he was rapidly declining. Would eat , drink, almost lifeless. We immediately STOPPED using this product and he seems to have improved to the same levels he was at prior to administration of the drops. So all I caution is to get your vet to approve before you use... we will not use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product! A few drops makes a world of difference.
customer_reviews.text: Our 19.5 year old cat is going into kidney failure. He only eats Science Diet K/D. But I know from experience that when they stop eating or slow down they will lose weight and eventually die. So my goal is to make sure he eats and this Wellbeing does the trick! He eats all his food and has maintained his weight for a few years now. It is a good product. My vet has even decreased his medication dose! They must eat. He is a slim 8.4 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working!
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly kitty and when she had her yearly vet visit, was told that her kidneys may not be functioning as normal as she was dehydrated, despite having a filtered fountain of unlimited water. They wanted to keep an eye on her to make sure it did t get worse. I decided to change her diet to low phosphate and get this remedy for her. Within a week, her coat became soft again, she gained weight and is eating like she used to, and might I add, a little more pep. So I would say, it's working so far
customer_reviews.author: S.  Russell

customer_reviews.title: This Has Saved My Cat's Life.
customer_reviews.text: This product has kept my cat going since he was diagnosed 2 years ago. The vet at that time said he only had about 2 months to live because of his Kidney Failure. 2 years later, at age 14 he is going strong. Thank you for this very excellent product. I tell everyone that has a dog or a cat to check your web site for all the other great products you offer. Thank you Susan Q/ California
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Life saving miracle juice
customer_reviews.text: There aren't words to express how thankful I am for this product. My 14 year old cat is doing better then ever and has new vigor and life in his eyes! After having kidney problems for quite sometime he was beginning to not only look sick but act sick too (stumbling and falling over) but not anymore you'd never guess how sick was! His coat is even shiny and fluffy again and he has put few pounds too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Our 17 year old cat was in the beginning stages ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 17 year old cat was in the beginning stages of kidney disease indicated by excessive drinking of water. After a month on Kidney Support Gold her water consumption went back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: skierjoe

customer_reviews.title: Cat doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: My cat will not eat the food when I mix this in it...she can smell it and turns up her nose. I can give her the same food w/o this and she is fine with it. Was really hoping she would take this to help her but no such luck.
customer_reviews.author: L Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Great product, leaky dropper lid
customer_reviews.text: I truly believe this to be helping my old cat with some early stage renal issues. He doesn't drink as much water after being on this medicine for a few months which in turn makes him eliminate less. He seems a lot more at ease to me. My only complaint is that the dropper that comes with the bottle leaks really bad. It just comes out all over my fingers before I can even add it to the cat food. Bummer. Still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be beneficial
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is in the early stages of kidney problems. I am not sure if this is helping or if it's the combination of her antibiotics and anti-gas tablets but it may be doing something for her. She is doing amazingly well since she has been receiving this twice a day. I love the fact that it is easy to give to her and such a small amount that she does not spit it out!
customer_reviews.author: Cristine K.

customer_reviews.title: really works
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt that this saved my cats life. Her blood work was so bad that the vet said cats just don't come back from this. He said I might want to consider putting her down. She was 1 year old and I had to try something. It took about 5-6 days till things started happening. She started eating again and slowly improved. 9 months later, she is happy and active. I had her blood work done and it is a lot better, not perfect, but good enough. It is well worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: skippy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: my cat was diagnosed with CKD and she only has one kidney-the other one was removed in surgery when she had a mass on it. a month ago she was hardly eating-no matter what i offered she ate just a little. within 2 weeks of giving her this -4 drops twice a day on her food which she has no problems with-her appetite is ravenous and she is like a young kitten-very wild-running outside like crazy-i have also been giving her pro biotics but not as much as this so i believe she is just feeling so much better that that's why she's acting the way she is.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: works incredibly fast at least in our case.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was throwing up 2 times a day. After taking the kidney support it stopped as long as she gets a dose a day. Really amazing stuff. They just have to work on the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert z.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: I seems to be helping my cat. She has kidney disease. The first few tests the vet said her numbers werent coming down fast enough, but now they are coming down. She still has very little appetite but is starting to eat a little. The numbers do look better so Im still praying. I mix it in with her food.
customer_reviews.author: Angela OBryant

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: Since I started my 14 year old cat on this product he seems more himself. I was told at the Vet that he is just starting to have kidney failure.
customer_reviews.author: hockeygram

customer_reviews.title: My Second Order
customer_reviews.text: My cat with CKD (chronic kidney disease) has been on this for approximately 3 months. His creatinine went from 3.1 to 2.8. I did make a couple other changes to his diet which could have helped to lower his number but the most exciting news is that the rest of his labs were within normal range. I am going to continue this for another 3 months and will post an update after the next labs.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Golfer

customer_reviews.title: I've used this product for my 16 year old cat ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for my 16 year old cat for about two years now and I feel that it has arrested her kidney deterioration. At our last annual visit to the Vet. her blood test showed that her condition has not worsened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gave us time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Oct 2019 when my 20 year old cat was diagnosed with stage 4 kidney failure. We gave this to her everyday and was told that our cat only had a month to live and nothing would help. I honestly have no idea if this helped but I know that she took it everyday and we were blessed with almost another year with her. I’m thankful for this product and the time it might have helped with
customer_reviews.author: mslate

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be really helping my beloved 16 yr old with kidney disease. Also but her on all-wet diet, put pumpkin in her food more fiber, and made her a bigger water fountain, but she really seems better since I started giving her this. All natural product. No drugs.
customer_reviews.author: CatWoman

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Good product. My cat is 20 years old and has kidney disease. I've seen a marked difference in her drinking water and urination since we started using this product twice a day. It wasn't easy to get her started on it, but she takes it relatively easily now.
customer_reviews.author: TWool1

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat Angel will turn 15 May 1, 2020. A few years ago her blood work showed first signs of kidney failure which wasn't a surprise because she was over 10 years old. I have been giving her Kidney Support Gold since then and her blood work this week was NORMAL!!!! Her kidneys are functioning like they should. My vet was really surprised by this because of her age. I HIGHLY recommend!!!!! Kidney failure is the biggest killer of cats. I will always give any senior cat I ever have Kidney Support Gold!
customer_reviews.author: Roxfan Heil

customer_reviews.title: didnt work for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: like some other reviewers, this product, even only 1-2 drops a day, irritated my 15 yr old rescue; she had symptoms of cytitis: in and out of litterbox repeatedly, passin only drops, sometimes w/spot of blood..really hoped it would help her "senior elevated kidney values (BUN, creatinine), but after a few tries, had to admit this was NOT helping..been giving a pinch from a saw palmetto capsule, which relieved the cystitis.
customer_reviews.author: gena

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. I can't say it won't help others, but it did not help my cat. Bê passed away one week ago. I have my doubts that any of these testimonials are actually real.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy de Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Al the ragdoll
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old cat was diagnosed with kidney disease and we thought we would have to put him down. I just couldn't bring myself to do it because he was otherwise still our precious boy. Three weeks ago I ordered this product after reading several reviews. I am amazed. He went from peeing on the floor in front of the box to happily getting into the box. His coat is improving tremendously. I am keeping my fingers crossed that this product is the reason.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Thank you so much for this very effective Pet Wellbeing kidney support.
customer_reviews.text: Effectiveness to my cat who was seriuosly deteriorating for kidney failure and spend so much time and money but nothing was working. My cat takes it in appropriate dosage and mix it wih water in a syringe. We thought she wouldn’t survive in a few days. But I saw this in amazon and ordered to try it and in a week she regained some strength and started getting up, asking for food and water, I have to syringe the food and water mixed with Pet Wellbeing Kidney Support, she started going to her litter box again, eating and gaining weight and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pecson

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without it.
customer_reviews.text: My oldest cat will be 21 in October, when it appeared that his kidney function was declining several years ago I started him on Kidney support. Every time we see his vet she is always surprised at how well he is doing. I am sure that many things contribute to his well being, but I firmly believe that this is a big contributor to slowing the decline in his kidney function..
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Q

customer_reviews.title: 2nd bottle
customer_reviews.text: I believe this stuff is helping my cat who has early kidney disease. He seems to go pee a little less which is good cuz he was drinking tons and peeing tons everyday but not as much anymore (but he's not back to normal either). The bottle lasts a while so that's a plus and my very picky cat will have it in his wet food which is great since he can be pretty picky.
customer_reviews.author: R G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kidneys, Terrible for Flavor
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a tasty treat that satisfies your cat's taste buds and treats their kidney disease, then this product is not for you. Other reviewers mentioned the smell, but I had not stuck my nose near the liquid at my last order. Well, it stinks! But it works. So, much like kids taking their nasty cherry medication, your cat may not like it, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherK

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 year old cat appeared healthy until November 2019. She suddenly stopped eating and seemed out or sorts. The vet gave us the bad news so we started her on prescription wet and dry food. I ordered your product. She still would not eat but as soon as I started the drops, she has not stopped eating. She is back to her old self. I believe your product does what is claimed. We hope to have her for a while before her kidneys fail.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting better & playing too
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t know about the taste or flavor but my finicky aging cat likes it. My aging cat that has been showing with some signs of kidney issues is already on low Phosphorus food & distilled water - is now after being on this “kidney Support Gold” & some high calorie additive is doing ssooo much better, putting on some of the weight he loss & has even started playing some too.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Joy P

customer_reviews.title: 20 yr old cat has gained 2 pounds
customer_reviews.text: My cat has the beginning stages of kidney failure she's 20 years old and weighing in at 5 pounds before I started using this product she now is eatting like a little pig and weighs 7 pounds not sure how her numbers are but she's definitely feeling better looks healthier and her coat looks better aswell .. great product amazing product for your pet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smell of the drug is horrible. It's nothing like salmon
customer_reviews.text: I just receive the item. I don't know if it's effective or not. But I agree to some reviews. The smell of the drug is horrible. It's nothing like salmon. It's like some cough syrup for human. I don't think my cat will like the taste or smell. I just mixed 1 drop to his can food. He's okey to eat it. I'll do that for a few days and then add two drops for a few days. Hope he'll get used to the taste/smell gradually. I cross my fingers that he'll tolerate 5 drops eventually. But I think the producer should improve the smell/taste to be more cat friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked !
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 elderly cats.One had an overactive thyroid and kidney problem.It wasn't looking good.I found this product at Amazon,read the reviews and bought it.After a 2nd blood profile,the results showed that my cat's kidney functions had returned to normal .Maybe this is the magic elixir.I am giving it to the other 3 cats one of which s 22 years old.I am going to continue using it.I recommend it for all cat owner's having older cats.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't be without this. It's helping my cat live a quality life.
customer_reviews.text: My 19 year old cat was diagnosed with kidney failure over 2 years ago and I started her on this right away. She still has a good quality of life even though her Vet told me most cats would be dead with her kidney function values. I believe this product has made the difference. I give her 3 drops in 1 ml of water twice a day mixed in a syringe. I put it in her mouth as she won't take it in her food or drink it in her water. She is not keen on the taste. She has always been on the finicky side.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Tatro

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Got this 10 days ago. I was skeptical at first but since then my senior boy (18+ yrs) with kidney issues didn’t needed weekly enema he went through for16 months. It’s been a while since he deprecated by himself even though he is on 5 different prescriptions. Hopefully the new positive trend continues but not sure about the long term effects of this product. So far so good with my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't do anything for my cat. I put her on it for 2 weeks and 1week of sub Q fluids and her levels are worse. 10 something. It was 8 2 weeks ago. I will continue to give fluids but put this stuff in the garbage. I didn't expect a cure but at least make her blood work improve.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Uguccioni

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I noticed was that my cat was not always at the water bowl. Of course he drinks his water just not as much. So far I'm happy with this product. Have not had vet check his levels yet he was in early stage of kidneys. I will take him thou. This product is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Test results prove it really works!
customer_reviews.text: Just had blood work done to check Sam's BUN and Creatinine levels one year post kidney disorder diagnosis. Couldn't get him to eat a kidney support diet, this product was the only treatment. Vet was "stunned" by how well he was doing. Very tiny increases, she thought his bad test levels would have doubled in a year. Will definitely keep using this product. Plus he loves it on his food.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tolliver

customer_reviews.title: Kidney Support Gold works
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this for 3 years to my 15 year old cat who has had kidney disease for 3 years. I use the dropper so not sure he likes the flavor, but he takes it well and never gags. He is doing well so I think this product is helping. It is much easier to give him that the kidney tablets we used for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Rico

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely an item that is hard to tell if it works. My cat is on a large treatment plan for chronic kidney disease, his numbers have gotten worse but there are so many variables and some things are just random. Soooo does it work, who knows, but why not try!!?? The smell is pretty bad, which leads me to believe it tastes horrible to him, but I don’t see how they could changes the taste if the ingredients in it are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Madison_b97

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat was diagnosed with Kidney issues about a month ago. Found this product online while doing some research. It has definitely helped our cat. He is alert and does not hang around the water bowl as much. We noticed a difference within a week. The cat is a finicky eater and no problems with the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: My Cat loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: We mix this with our cats treats and she loves it. It is hard to say how effective it is, but my cat is over 20 years old and still has very good energy and is very healthy. We are doing what we can to keep it that way. This was recommended to us from a friend that said it really helped her cat live a couple additional years.
customer_reviews.author: Golfstar83

customer_reviews.title: Stage 4 renal recovery.
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yo cat was diagnosed with stage 4 renal failure. He looked terrible, lost a lot of weight, wouldn't eat, smelled awful. The vet gave him 3 days to a few weeks to live. We gave him sub-q Lactated Ringer's Solution every day and after a week started giving him Kidney Support Gold. Now five weeks later he is behaving almost fully normal again, eating his renal support cat food, going outdoors and even catching lizzards. We continue to administer sub-q Lactated Ringer's Solution every couple of days and feed him Kidney Support Gold with his food every day. I sure seems that Kidney Support Gold helps!
customer_reviews.author: PRC

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping
customer_reviews.text: I have not had blood work done since using this product, so I’m not sure how it’s affecting my pets. I have two pets that are older and their kidneys are not functioning as well, I have noticed that my dog is not it’s experiencing tremors as she did before, for that reason I gave it a 5 star rating. While the bottles are always taped and seem to be sealed properly there has been some leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Worked magic like a wizard on a sick cat
customer_reviews.text: I was advised by our vet to try this upon learning of my eldest cornish rex's kidney failure. It only took a few days for his appetite to return and it has been pivotal in his recovery. I give it to him by mixing a few drops with a small amount of soft food twice a day and he gobbles it up without complaint. It has only been a couple weeks so any long term effects are yet to be discovered. I would suggest consulting your vet before administering.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Clark Roberson

customer_reviews.title: so far he is starting to eat more so I ...
customer_reviews.text: so far he is starting to eat more so I am hoping it continues to work. I will know when I take him to the vet in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: Saved the cat
customer_reviews.text: I brought her home to subcutaneous fluid administration etc and felt doomed. Since I had used other homeopathic remedies (for cough/allergies) successfully, I tried this. It's working. She's better and better every day. Addition - bought the kitty litter that detects problems. None. Very happy. She's eating well, drinking well, and very active. Homeopathy rules for cats.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Insurance for an older cat
customer_reviews.text: I give the kidney support 4 stars because the other product that I use regularly, the Thyroid Support has helped my older cat with her blood work. Over the course of a year, her thyroid levels have improved slightly, which is okay as she was only in the gray area previously. I'm giving her the Kidney Support to see if that helpfs as well.
customer_reviews.author: betterbegood

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Use Oil Diffusers Around Cats
customer_reviews.text: My cat went into kidney failure and this helped her get back to eating and extended her life for a little while. Her kidney failure happened because She was exposed to essential oils through an air diffuser and this made more complications that were not curable. Please be aware of using oil diffuser around cats.
customer_reviews.author: moonwolf

customer_reviews.title: I prefered to use my money in a better deal
customer_reviews.text: This does no work. We see no difference, cat hared it. None of the promoted features or benetifs we observed in our cats. Sorry, but this was a big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Improved quality of life for cats
customer_reviews.text: While this is a supplement it does seem to make our cat feel better and more active. She is 17 and was diagnosed last year with kidney disease. She takes this daily and her numbers were improved the last time we went to the vet. It is not a cure but is helpful in that it makes her feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy G.

product_meta.title: Pet Wellbeing - Kidney Support Gold for Cats - Natural Support for Feline Kidney Health - 2oz (59ml)
feature_bullets: Supports immune system functionality against kidney issues in cats
Promotes a natural increase in energy levels and general vitality
Maintains a regular appetite and healthy weight
Helps moderate normal hydration, urination, and thirst
Prepared from organically grown and selectively imported herbs from trusted growers.
